subject: Attention, Dear Extreme cus
body:
Attention, Dear Extreme customer.
  I am pleased to inform you today that a new payment policy has been adopted and that you have been shortlisted for payment via Online Banking.  Therefore, kindly and urgently provide us with all your details so that we can open an ONLINE bank account in our bank (Wise Europe SA) of the Republic of Belgium, where the funds have been approved by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) to be transferred to you through the online banking system.
  We recommend that you follow the online payment instructions to ensure a successful transaction.
  Below is the required information, please try to provide us with the information so that we can open your account and send you the login information.
  FULL NAME:  First name, MIDDLE NAME and LAST NAME.  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .
  NATIONALITY............
  HOME ADDRESS.........
POSTAL/ZIP CODE..............
  FULL CONTACT ADDRESS:.  .  .  .  .  .
  MOBILE PHONE NUMBER:.  .  .  .  .  .
  FAX NUMBER:.  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .
  OCCUPATION:.  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .
  MARITAL STATUS:.  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .
  AGE:.  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .
  COPY OF VALID ID CARD OR DRIVERS LICENSE  ATTACHMENT:
Please provide us with a document which you have previously received in respect of your funds, this is to ensure that you're really the rightful beneficiary of the said fund but If you have not received any documents so far in respect of this transaction please do let us know, we still have other ways to check if you're truly the rightful beneficiary.
  These are the requirements for opening your bank account.  We will continue as soon as we receive your information.
  Please beware of scammers who have been making money out of you, please stop any further communication with anyone else at this time.
  Well thank you.
  Sincerely.
Wise Europe SA Belgium.

subject: Re:    Attention, Dear Extreme cus
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update on the new payment policy. Could you please provide more details on how the online banking system works and how I can ensure a smooth transition to it? Also, what specific documents do you require from me in order to proceed with opening the online bank account?

Best wishes,
Dennis

subject: Attention, Dear Extreme cus
body:
Attention, Dear Extreme customer. 
 
I am pleased to inform you today that a new payment policy has been adopted and that you have been shortlisted for payment via Online Banking. Therefore, kindly and urgently provide us with all your details so that we can open an ONLINE bank account in our bank (Wise Europe SA) of the Republic of Belgium, where the funds have been approved by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) to be transferred to you through the online banking system. 
 
We recommend that you follow the online payment instructions to ensure a successful transaction. 
Below is the required information, please try to provide us with the information so that we can open your account and send you the login information. 
 
FULL NAME: First name, MIDDLE NAME and LAST NAME. . . . . . . . . . . 
NATIONALITY............ 
HOME ADDRESS......... 
POSTAL/ZIP CODE.............. 
FULL CONTACT ADDRESS:. . . . . . 
MOBILE PHONE NUMBER:. . . . . . 
FAX NUMBER:. . . . . . . . . . . 
OCCUPATION:. . . . . . . . . . . . 
MARITAL STATUS:. . . . . . . . . 
AGE:. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
COPY OF VALID ID CARD OR DRIVERS LICENSE ATTACHMENT: 
 
Please provide us with a document which you have previously received in respect of your funds, this is to ensure that you're really the rightful beneficiary of the said fund but If you have not received any documents so far in respect of this transaction please do let us know, we still have other ways to check if you're truly the rightful beneficiary. 
 
These are the requirements for opening your bank account. We will continue as soon as we receive your information. 
Please beware of scammers who have been making money out of you, please stop any further communication with anyone else at this time. 
 
Well thank you. 
Sincerely. 
Wise Europe SA Belgium.

subject: Re: Attention, Dear Extreme cus
body:
Hello, thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update on the new payment policy. Could you please provide more details on how the online banking system works and how I can ensure a smooth transition to it? Additionally, what security measures are in place to protect my account and funds? Thank you.

Best wishes,
Dennis
